Perceptor:

"Set a trap to Rodimus, capture him , bring him to a retention place and 
find out what happend to him"said stoicly Perceptor.

"Oddly "replied Windlord "I'm a gree with him, but how will atract him"

"we can find out if still has an interest in his family... and if he does, 
use it as bait"replied the blind predacon

"isnt it what a predacon would do?" said almost annoyed Windlord

"Still I AM a Predacon"remarked Perceptor

"ELITA IS A CHILD AND NIGHTLIGHT ISNT IN GOOD SHAPE!!!"

"Taking in count how willing is Nighlight to help, she can rest a little 
before attemp to do it" and perceptor added "Beside we have to ask her if 
she know somehting... i heard something that make me think that she may know 
something"

-----Mensaje original----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Tuesday, August 16, 2011 5:24 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Nightmares . . .

>
> "She's starting show the craws" commented Perceptor "It was time"
>
> "Do you have something to do with that Perceptor?" said Windlord, who
> arrived shortly after Nightligh left
>
> "I didnt have any hand in what happened here... or with Rodimus"replied
> camly

<NEW>

LEO PRIME walked NIGHTLIGHT to the door, tryinto be as comforting as
possible, his optics kept in a kindly light and his arm on her
shoulder consoling. "Don't worry, we will let you know what's
happening as soon as we know."

As NIGHTLIGHT left the room and tried to hang around to listen LEO
walked back into the room, his optics on PERCEPTOR and WINDLORD and
then finally LORD ELDER.

"You're right Perceptor." LORD ELDER said finally. "She is starting to
show her claws, and she has a right to. Her husband and child are
missing, she herself was captured. Any of us would react the same."

LEO PRIME nodded, "You're right. But now what?"

"She has training as a Scout." LEGACY interjected. "It is unknown if
her skill set will lend itself to this endevor."

LORD ELDER looked over at WINDLORD and PERCEPTOR, "We don't think
anyone here has done anything to start this, but if anyone has any
suggestions, the floor is open."

LEO PRIME nodded in a agreement. The look on his face saying he was
not happy with the prospects.

(TAG)

Preston
